# Available rules


## FFF

Enforce all the rules in this category, as well as all higher priority rules, with:

```json
{
  "extends": "plugin:d3/recommended"
}
```

| Rule ID | Description |  
|:--------|:------------|:---|
| [vue/no-pie](./no-pie.md) | Disallow pie charts |
